items.title: Database
items.description: Findable, accessible and organised collections of datasets, software, and other digital objects that can be browsed and downloaded.

items.title: Standards
items.description: Requirements, specifications or guidelines that can be used for the description, interoperability, citation, sharing, publication, or preservation of all kinds of digital objects.

items.title: Policies
items.description: Data policy statements implemented by an organization such as a journal publisher, a project consortium, a funder or an institution.

items.title: Collections
items.description: Groups of records spanning these three registries according to specific criteria (common standards, organizations or a particular journalâ€™s data policy).
